title: A Stereospecific Synthesis and In Vitro Anti-Influenza H1N1 Properties of Lithocholic Acid-Based
abstract: Bile acids provide a versatile platform for the design of biologically active compounds due to their amphiphilic structure, biocompatibility, and capacity for diverse chemical modifications. Among them, lithocholic acid is a promising scaffold for designing and revealing new antiviral agents. A novel lithocholic acid-based 3-
